sentences.en: A variable number of nuclear bodies , described as micronucleoli - like bodies, were observed.
sentences.cn: 还观察到有数目不等的核子体, 叫做微核仁状子体.

sentences.en: Decisions could be made on the basis of price, delivery dates, after-sales service or any other variable.
sentences.cn: 购买决定可能会基于价格、送货日期、售后服务以及其他可变因素。

sentences.en: Expect variable cloudiness and fog tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 预计明天多云有雾，天气多变。

sentences.en: He is of a variable mood ; he never finishes what he starts.
sentences.cn: 他这个人朝三暮四,做起事来总是虎头蛇尾.

sentences.en: Horizontal resistance, being variable in the wild state, can be domesticated.
sentences.cn: 水平抗性在野生状态下是可变的, 它可以驯化.

sentences.en: In some programming languages, a variable whose value is a character string.
sentences.cn: 在某些程序设计语言中, 一种值为字符串的变量.

sentences.en: Interest rates can be highly variable.
It is conventional to place the independent variable on the right-hand side of an equation.
sentences.cn: 普遍做法是把自变量放在等式的右边。

sentences.en: Our team's performance this year has been variable.
sentences.cn: 我们队今年成绩很不稳定.

sentences.en: People are not only complex but also highly variable.
sentences.cn: 人不仅是复杂的,而且也是多变的.

sentences.en: Speed was a variable in the experiment.
sentences.cn: 在该实验中速度是个变数.

sentences.en: The drill has variable speed control.
The potassium content of foodstuffs is very variable.
sentences.cn: 食物中钾的含量差别很大。

sentences.en: The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable.
sentences.cn: 汽车挡风玻璃上雨刷的速度是可变的.

sentences.en: The variable weather is a great trial to me.
sentences.cn: 这种多变的天气真是让我受不了.

sentences.en: There are too many variables in the experiment to predict the result accurately.
sentences.cn: 实验中可变因素太多，难以准确预测结果。

sentences.en: There was a bit of a wind and it was blowing onshore, variable, but quite strong.
sentences.cn: 有一阵风朝岸上吹来，风向变化不定，但风力很强。

sentences.en: Variable levies can insulate farmers and consumers from world markets.
sentences.cn: 差价进口税可以把农民和消费者与世界市场隔离开来.

words.tran_cn: 多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
可变性，变化性；[生物][数] 变异性
变异；变化；不一致；分歧；[数] 方差
变化；[生物] 变异，变种
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
[生物][数][光]变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，畸变的

phrases.tran_cn: 随机变数，随机变量；无规变量
[控制系统]状态变量；[热力学]热力学态函数（等于thermodynamic function of state）
变速流，变化的流动；异形流动
可变螺距；可变节距；变斜度

trans.tran_cn: 变化的，可变的，[数]变量的，[生]变异的
可变因素，变量，易变的东西
trans.tran_en: something that may be different in different situations, so that you cannot be sure what will happen
